name: Princess Pri and the Infinitely Irritating Castle
name_original: Princess Pri and the Infinitely Irritating Castle
description:
After a series of "diplomatic incidents" involving a series of very un-diplomatic princes, Princess Pri now finds herself at the entrance of Castle Caprisarious -- home to royalty, treasure, guards, and a ton of ants for some reason. Help her steal everything not nailed down!

Princess Pri and the Infinitely Annoying Castle is a roguelike made in 7 days for 7DRL 2019. It features a spellbook crafting system, 3D/tactical terrain, and a good sense of humor. The game takes about 30 minutes to win, and 30 seconds to lose... and expect to lose a fair bit. Luckily, the procedurally generated maps and skills should keep your mind off the pain. Enjoy!
